Content: My name is Jody I drive a newer softail but recently purchased a 1981 Honda passport. It was not running when I purchased it and I am not a mechanic but I have been able to get it started and idling although I cannot get the lights to work, so if there’s any advice out there for electrical work please feel free to give it.
